trends: There have been no other sightings in New Roads
This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: Sighting Detailsi was coming home and had just got out of the car and seen something sphere shaped shoot up into the sky for some reason it was smoking from i guess the back,it was moving so fast it definitly wasn't a plane they cant go that fast.It passed around 30-40 feet or more away from us.It moved incredibly fast there were 2 witnesses including myself.We looked at it for about a second while it moved then it dissapeared.I felt scared out of my mind and couldnt move.
